channel.title: [req] im looking for a base
channel.description:
hey so im looking for a base and i would love to use rs2d or hyperion but i cannot seem to really get those to work for me yet i want a server that is basically a framework that is stable. so i looked around and i decided that emulous 1.5 would be the perfect base but then when i looked into it it was messy and redundant and from the looks delta. [i]so i was wondering if anyone could give me a name or point me in the direction of a base or framework that is an equivalent of emulous 1.5 just less messy and redundant[/i]. now it doesnt have to have all the features or even half of them but i was using it to give you guys a general idea of what im looking for.
link to emulous - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,334497.0/all.html

item.title: [req] im looking for a base
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Umm why dont you just use it and edit it like everyone else. Dont think its anymore bases like that one in perticular other then that.

Besides make it look cleaner and decent its already a stable source, it just needs you to fix it up. And it gives you a reason to code so you wont be a nooby leecher. So just use that base or use the search box to find one if it doesnt show up then its not on here lol.

Read full topic
